description:
One weekend morning as Tatsumi heads to the bathroom with breakfast, he hears lively voices coming from inside.
The puzzled Tatsumi opens the bathroom door and discovers a mysterious octopus? No, it`s Wakasa`s friend Takasu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La situation des amis de Wakasa - Takatsu
The Circumstances of Wakasa`s Friends: Takasu Edition
Wakasa no Tomodachi Jijou: Takasu Hen
若狭のトモダチ事情・鷹巣編
